Text.Language: Ariacpazecye: qen ouvi eyouab: matoubo n~netenh/t: e~bol ha kakia niben.
Greet, with a holy kiss, purify your hearts, from every evil thing.

Swpi e~re tencebtwt: e~]dwrea~ n~te `Vnou]: sa n~teten[i e~bol: qen naimuct/rion.
Be prepared, for the gift of God, that you may be given, these mysteries.

Ebol hiten nai: eyrensasni e~ounai: nem ou,w e~bol n~te nennobi: kata pefnis] n~nai.
Through these, we may win mercy, and forgiveness of our sins, according to His great mercy.

Tenouwst m~mok w~ Pi,~rictoc: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma eyouab: je (aki~) akcw] m~mon: nai nan.
We worship You O Christ, with Your good Father, and the Holy Spirit, for You have (come) and saved us. Have mercy upon us.

Pi,~rictoc Pencwt/r: a~ritenn~emp~sa: m~pekacpacmoc eyouab: n~h~r/i qen niv/oui.
O Christ our Savior, make us worthy, of Your holy peace, in the heavens.
